a person who claims that someone has done something morally wrong, illegal, or unkind: She was given the chance to face her accusers. His accusers claim he has lied repeatedly. See
accuse
More examplesFewer examplesThe accuser's story kept changing and there was no supporting evidence.She stated that she did not believe the accuser was telling the truth.At least one of Mr Smith's chief accusers is not credible.You have the right to confront your accusers.
